result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda E. Morgan

defendant.name: Morgan, Amanda E.
defendant.address: 720 E B Street, Iron Mountain, MI 49801

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
10:12 AM Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Amanda E. Morgan.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Hansen heard - Case has been resolved.
Atty Hansen provides plea form.
ADA heard on agreement.
Atty Hansen agrees.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1.
Deft enters a plea of guilty.
Non-citizen advisory.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on jury until civil rights are restored.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Elements of offense.
Atty Hansen satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1.
Court dismisses and reads-in counts 2 and 3.
Court orders presentence investigation be completed.  
Agent to provide report to court at least 2 weeks prior to sentencing. 
10:24 AM off record.
10:26 AM back on record.
Court schedules with parties.
Court orders deft to go to the DOC office today to schedule the PSI.
Court orders deft to cooperate with the PSI process.
10:28 AM
Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

3:28 PM Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in court.  Attorney Spansail in court, on behalf of Atty Hansen, for Amanda E. Morgan.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court heard and will reschedule due to Atty Hansen's illness.
Court schedules.
3:31 PM
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Amanda E. Morgan appeared by Zoom video.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Amanda E. Morgan.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
3:14 p.m.
Copy of Information.
Waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Requests STC.
3:16 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 03:10 pm.

3:41 PM Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Amanda E. Morgan.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
3:44PM
Arraignment scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
9:17 AM Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Brad Hansen appears in court for deft.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal readings.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
9:18 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

01:58 PM Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven.  Defendant Amanda E. Morgan in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amanda E. Morgan appeared by video means with Attorney.
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Deft qualifies for PD representation.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Schraven heard on bond.
Court imposes $1,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx. 
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
Court schedules with parties.
1:59 PM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
